summary: Remake of Jules Verne's classic story finds adventurers seeking a mysterious hidden land. They are joined by the wife of another man, who had previously gone on a similar expedition and disappeared.
cast: Treat Williams|Jeremy London|Tushka Bergen|Hugh Keays-Byrne|Bryan Brown|Tessa Wells|Petra Yared|Sarah Chadwick|Peter Kaa|Joe Bugner|Alan Hardy|Bill Charles|John Forsyth|Warwick Begg|Christopher Christo|Anaru Grant|Matiu Tarawa|Trevor Cockay|Warwick Sadler|Bassem Abousaid|Robert Rabiah
keywords: psychotronic series|expedition|tv mini series|foreign language adaptation|vortex

title: Viaje al centro de la Tierra
